1.0.name: wordpress/site-user
1.0.description: This plugin allows you to create users which are not default wp_users by generating a Registration/Login functionality on frontend, Plugin is helpfull when we need to create and manage users irrespective of wordpress default users. this plugin generate a Session ($_SESSION['user']) which can be used throughout the site to perform different actions regarding the logged in Site Users, so devlopers can use this session to enhance the functionality of session.
